name: Paddle Pong
description:
Bounce a ball over platforms with a paddle controlled by the mouse. Platforms towards the end of the level are worth more points. Moving the mouse above or below the median point will rotate the paddle clockwise or anti-clockwise proportional to how far you've moved the mouse.

This is a practice prototype to prepare for the upcoming Ludum Dare (April 2021). This project was made purely for practice and is not meant to be complete or even particularly good. Feedback is still welcome, of course! Enjoy!
